name: For The Queen (Uneven Pixel)
description:
The Queen has been taken by the dastardly King of Spades! As the lowly pawn of the chess board, you must fight through the treacherous minions of the other board games in order to get to the  Poker Table and save your matriarch!

An action horde rogue like in which you will roll dice every round and use them on abilities and bonus cards in order to fight continuous hordes and a multitude of bosses!

(Game Jam Version only has 2 stages, and does not have the final bosses or stages)
